overview: The AI system memory contains information about a significant update to a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. The update involves the removal of the counter feature and the introduction of a comprehensive onboarding flow with multiple pages and sliding transitions. The changes affect the app's structure, functionality, and public interface.
key_events: User requested removal of counter feature and creation of an onboarding flow for Gyde app
System provided a high-level plan for the requested changes
System detailed the changes to the public interface due to the new onboarding flow
user_requests: User requested the removal of the counter feature and the creation of an onboarding flow for the Gyde app, including multiple pages with specific content and sliding transitions
system_responses: System provided a high-level plan outlining the new features, modified features, removed features, architectural changes, and cross-cutting concerns
System detailed the changes to the public interface, including additions, removals, and changes to the application architecture, dependencies, files, and sections
current_state: The project is currently in the planning phase for a significant update to the Gyde app. The update will remove the counter feature and introduce a comprehensive onboarding flow. The changes will significantly affect the app's structure, functionality, and public interface, shifting the focus from the home view to the onboarding flow.
